Type: Mangalsutra Set

Upgrade your traditional look with our stunning Eye-Catching Design Gold Plated Mangalsutra Set. With its shining multicolor design and latest trend, this set will add a touch of elegance to any bridal outfit. Made with brass and featuring diamond and black Moti accents, this golden set is a must-have for any special occasion.
